rules.title: Healing a Dying Ally
rules.text: If an ally is at 0 health, you can use an action to attempt to heal them. Make an Intellect test, Pass: 15, Fail: 10. On a pass they regain 1 Health, on a fail they lose 1 Stamina.

rules.title: Healing when Catching Your Breath
rules.text:
When you Catch Your Breath, you patch up and tend to any non life threatening injuries.
If you Catch Your Breath and are at 0 Health, you regain 1 Health.
